title: Villains Are Destined to Die, Vol. 5
description: “Your eyes, my lady, are only filled with sorrow, never joy.”Penelope and Callisto safely escaped the assassins, but the danger is far from over. The crown prince has been left in mortal peril, and Penelope…is standing trial for attempted murder?! Accused of attacking seven nobles during the Hunt, she faces a court proceeding that, in actuality, is nothing more than an elaborate sham to frame her. With false testimonies filling the courtroom, Derrick proving himself untrustworthy, and Callisto being unfit to take the stand, will Penelope rise against all odds and prevail…?
author: SUOL
